0.text: You are a coastal planner facing rising sea levels. Choose your first action to protect the community.

options.option: Build a seawall to defend against storm surges
Restore mangroves to absorb wave energy

a.text: You chose to build a seawall. Decide how to improve or maintain your seawall strategy.

options.option: Invest in stronger, more durable materials
Add natural buffers alongside the wall

b.text: You chose to restore mangroves. Decide how to manage the restoration project.

options.option: Focus on fast-growing species for quick results
Limit restoration to small areas to save budget

c.text: You chose to relocate houses inland. Decide how to support the community during relocation.

options.option: Provide financial incentives and new infrastructure
Offer temporary housing and job training
Relocate only the most vulnerable families
